<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="WSDL Query Authentication Policy Fragment"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Configure the required security policy for the WSDL Query Handler in this policy"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Per-service authentication can be performed by referring to the ${serviceId} context variable which is set in the WSDL Query Handler service policy"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Default policy is HTTP Basic Authentication over SSL"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
            <L7p:Detail stringValue="Policy Fragment: WSDL Query Authentication"/>
        </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
        <L7p:SslAssertion/>
        <L7p:HttpBasic/>
        <L7p:Authentication>
            <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
        </L7p:Authentication>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
